subject: ticket system not working
description_text:
good afternoon, whenever i email you guys i get created a ticked. problem
is that the link sends me to https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/support/home and
doesnt actually make a ticket.
is there any way you guys can contact me via email?

kind regards,
Robin Dijt

conversations.body_text:
Good morning,
I received my pedals yesterday and im working on installing them. The
pedals are all setup and im starting on placing the vibration modules and i
am missing one of the installation brackets for the modules.
It would be the clutch mounting braket that is missing.
Is there any way i can have it sent to my address?

Thanks in advance,
Robin
ID 号为 7572 和 8290 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7572  
      主题: order #SSN3743  
      描述:  
 
 
 Good afternoon,  
 I recently ordered the simpson pro x Ultra pedals with baseplate and the VAM pro linear motor haptics. I just received the haptics but have not gotten any confirmation on the pedals.  
 Can I get some more info on when they are expected to arrive? 
 
 the order number is #SSN3743 
   
 Kind regards,  
 
 Robin Dijt

合并来自工单8290  
      主题: missing part  
      描述:  
 
 
 Good afternoon,  
 I'm mailing to ask about a part that i am missing for my simsonn Vibration Auxillery Motor.  
 i recently ordered the simsonn pro x ultra pedals with the 3 pack VAM. i received both packages last week and i am missing the mount for the clutch motor. is there any way i can have one sent to my address?  
 
 The order number is #SSN3743 
   
 thanks in advance,  
 
 Robin Dijt
